author.name: Bryan Berry - Nathen Harvey - Matt Ray

entry.title: Community Summit - Recap
entry.content:
Join us as we recap the Opscode Community Summit.

Watch Now

  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download

    • Video

Panel

  • John Dyer twitter
  • Mike Fiedler github, twitter, blog
  • JJ Ashgar twitter, github
  • Ian Meyer twitter, github
  • Bryan Berry github, twitter, irc: bryanwb, blog: devopsanywhere
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog

Outline

A bunch of links mentioned in no particular order:

  • http://docs.opscode.com/api_omnitruck.html
  • http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shuhari

  • https://speakerdeck.com/wfarr/valiantly-validating-vagrant-with-vagabond

entry.title: Community Summit - Day 1
entry.content:
Join Nathen as he discusses the first day of the Opscode Community Summit with Tom Duffield and John Dyer.

Check the github-based wiki for notes from many of the sessions.

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Download

Panel

  • John Dyer twitter
  • Tom Duffield twitter, github
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog

Outline

  • Opscode Community Summit
  • Introductions
  • Killswitch Engage
  • Open Spaces
  • Berkshelf
  • Chef without a git repo
  • The Community Site
  • The CLA Signing Process
  • EchoSign
  • Vagrant with chef-solo and chef-zero
  • knife-essentials
  • The Education and Training Session
  • Attribute Validation
  • Cookbook as Library Gems
  • chef-rewind
  • poise
  • eclipse
  • Riot Games
  • Versioning in Chef 12
  • test-kitchen
  • #ChefConf 2014
  • Awesome Chef Awards Nominations
  • Heavy Water
  • Dyn
